description:
The Fitch Law Firm is one of Central Ohio's most highly respected personal injury firms. Founded by attorney John Fitch, our Columbus-based firm now proudly serves all the residents of Ohio from our five offices located around the state, including the one in Beavercreek. From our Beavercreek law office, we serve the people of the Dayton area and surrounding east-central Ohio who have legal needs due to the following:

  • Personal injury
  • Medical malpractice
  • Trucking accidents
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Traumatic brain injuries (TBI)
  • Sexual abuse
  • Bad drugs and medical devices

Our founder has practiced law in the state of Ohio for more than 30 years. In the years that have passed since he began his legal career, he has secured numerous settlements and verdicts for his clients. As a result of his success, he is a member of the Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum, which is a prestigious association open only to attorneys who have secured $2 million or more in a settlement or jury verdict.

If you want an attorney who has experience and a proven track record, look no further than The Fitch Law Firm. We have years of experience representing clients in Ohio, and we can help you pursue compensation for your injuries. To learn more about why the people of Ohio continuously turn to our law firm, you can schedule a free initial consultation.
